name: consentmanger/consentmanager-v2
description: Consent Manager is a GDPR / CCPA consent management solution (SaaS, Software as a Service). In simple words a “cookie banner”. This tool allows to ask website visitors for consent and/or enable opt-out from data processing, cookies, sale of personal information and so on. This helps our clients to fulfil their legal requirements under GDPR, CCPA and other legislations.
